column2:
"<%me>...
Where are we?"
"Well, well, quite the familiar faces we have here."
"That voice...!"

"What a coincidence, meeting you two in a place like this.
...Then again, is it really so unlikely?"
"Luther!"
"Whoa, hold on there. I'm not here to fight you."
"1. Where are we?"
"2. How are you alive?"
"I'm surprised you even need to ask. This is the belly of the beast. Dark Falz [Double]'s inner universe."
"You and I, we've been eaten. By Dark Falz [Double], that is."
"Ah, now there's an interesting question. After all, can one really consider this to be life?"
"This is [Double]'s inner universe. You and I have been eaten, and thus we find ourselves in the belly of the beast."
"Not that I have much to complain about. The things you experience inside of a Dark Falz aren't so easily found elsewhere."
"Once you get used to it, it's actually pretty fun here."
"Besides which, I no longer have any interest in the outside world. A world without Xion... without omniscience... is not one in which I wish to live."
"Understand, my lady? I no longer have any reason to antagonize you. So, why not lower your weapon?"
"Thank you. Now that we understand that we're all friends here, let me accompany you."
"This place is rather dangerous, but also rather interesting. I'd be delighted to show you around."
"-Best Worst Last Toys-"
"The Failed Masterpiece"
